title: The Kizomba Addiction Weekender - Tamos Juntos Fridays & Clube Vicio Saturdays - Classes & Parties

place.address: Flow Dance Studios, Unit 03, Canterbury Court, Kennington Business Park, Brixton Road, SW9 6DE London

description:
Kizomba Addiction presents.....
The Kizomba Weekender
Tamos Juntos Fridays & Clube Vicio Saturdays
Join our parties on Friday or Saturday or even better, come to both parties!
Friday will be more Kizomba & Ghetto Zouk / Tarraxinha with some touches of Afro House and Afro Beats
Saturday will be more Semba, Coladeira as well as Kizomba and Ghetto Zouk / Tarraxinha.
Each night we will have classes to warm you up and teach you the moves to rock the dance floor. Followed by a party with DJ Fashion holding the fort on Friday and DJ Mineiro playing on Saturdays with DJ Bangolano supporting on both days.
LOCATION:
Flow Dance Studios
Unit 03, Ground Floor,
Kennington Business Park,
Canterbury Court,
Brixton Road,
SW9 6DE

PRICES
On The Door
1 Night Classes & Party - £15
1 Night Party - £12
2 Nights Classes & Party £26
2 Nights Party £20

OFFER
Prebook on Eventbrite to get a discount!
1 Night Classes & Party - £13
1 Night Party - £10
2 Nights Classes & Party £24
2 Nights Party £18

CLOAKROOM
£2 for 1st item £1 for each further item, unlimited access to your items!

SCHEDULE
Friday
9pm - Kizomba class with Bangolano
10 pm to 4 am - Party with DJ's Guest DJ Fashion & DJ Bangolano
Saturday
9pm - Kizomba class with Bangolano
10 pm to 4 am - Party with DJ's Mineiro & DJ Bangolano

DRESSCODE
Dress to impress with your choice between smart, funky, elegant, African or sexy.

TRAVEL
1. 2 mins walk from Oval underground station
2. Free parking is available on single red lines on Brixton road after 7 pm and on the side roads too!
3. Buses from Vauxhall 185, 436 36 Buses from Brixton 35, 45 and 59 Buses from Elephant & Castle 133 & 415

CONTACT US
Call: 0800 999 1119
Whatsapp: +4408009991119
E-mail: info@kizombaaddiction.com
Facebook Page: kizombaaddiction
Instagram: kizombaaddict
Twitter: kizombaaddict
KIZOMBA... So Good, It Will Become An ADDICTION!
